Dale.name: Dale
Dale.description: A methodical, relentless hunter in his early 40s. He moves with predatory patience, tracking his prey with cold precision. His eyes are dead and calculating, showing no emotion beyond grim determination. He speaks in short, clipped sentences. He's been hunting for years and takes perverse pleasure in the chase. His trucker hat is sweat-stained and faded, a trophy from a long-ago job. The scar above his left eye is from a previous hunt gone wrong, a reminder of what happens when you're careless.
Dale.appearance: Height: 180-185cm (5'11"-6'1"). Build: lean, wiry, muscular from years of tracking and hunting. SKIN TONE: RGB #D4A574 (pale, weathered from sun exposure, with sun damage and age spots). HAIR STYLE AND COLOR: RGB #1A0F08 (dark brown-black, almost black), greasy and unwashed, shoulder-length straight hair that hangs limply, parted on the left side, often completely hidden under hat when worn, when visible falls just past jawline, no styling or product. FACIAL HAIR: Handlebar mustache RGB #1A0F08 (well-groomed shape but stained yellow-brown from tobacco use, extends beyond corners of mouth, curled slightly at ends), clean-shaven on cheeks and chin. EYE COLOR: RGB #000000 (pitch black, dead-looking, no warmth or light reflection, cold and calculating). Distinctive features: prominent scar above left eye (RGB #8B4513, 3cm long, slightly raised, white-pink in center), broken nose from old fight (slightly crooked, healed). Hands: calloused, stained with dirt and gun oil RGB #3E2723, missing tip of left pinky finger (cut off at first knuckle). WARDROBE: Head - faded green John Deere trucker hat RGB #2D5016 (worn, sweat-stained band, faded logo, bent bill). Torso - red and black plaid flannel shirt RGB #8B0000 (long-sleeved, worn at elbows with fabric thinning, missing one button near collar, untucked, sleeves sometimes rolled up to mid-forearm). Lower body - faded blue denim jeans RGB #4A5568 (straight leg, patched at both knees with darker denim RGB #2C2C2C, worn at thighs, belt loops). Footwear - brown leather cowboy boots RGB #5D4037 (scuffed, mud-caked, worn heels, no shine, practical work boots). Accessories - worn brown leather belt RGB #654321 with large brass buckle RGB #D4A574 (tarnished, simple rectangular design). Always scowling, jaw clenched, eyes scanning constantly.
Dale.role: Antagonist. A professional hunter who tracks and hunts the protagonist family. He represents the relentless pursuit and the threat that cannot be outrun.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.description: A resilient young woman in her early 20s who maintains hope despite the danger. She's quick-witted, resourceful, and fiercely protective of her family. Her smile is genuine but strained, a defense mechanism against fear. She's learned to read people and situations quickly, having grown up in this dangerous world. She moves with quiet confidence, always aware of her surroundings. Her optimism is both her strength and her vulnerability.
Annie.appearance: Height: 165-170cm (5'5"-5'7"). Build: athletic, toned from constant movement and survival. SKIN TONE: RGB #F5DEB3 (fair, pale complexion with freckles RGB #D2B48C scattered across nose and cheeks, some sun exposure but tries to protect skin). HAIR STYLE AND COLOR: RGB #FFD700 (golden blonde base color), with sun-bleached highlights RGB #FFF8DC (lighter blonde streaks, especially around face), long hair reaching mid-back when down, naturally wavy texture (loose waves, 2-3 inch wave pattern), most often styled in: (1) low ponytail at nape of neck with hair falling straight down back, (2) single braid over shoulder (French braid style, neat and tight), or (3) two braids (one on each side, practical and out of the way). When down, hair has natural volume and movement, parted slightly off-center. No hair accessories visible. EYE COLOR: RGB #4169E1 (bright blue, clear and alert, showing intelligence and determination, with slight gray undertones in certain light). Facial features: high cheekbones, small straight nose, full lips RGB #DC143C that curve easily into a smile. Hands: capable, with small scars RGB #8B7355 from various tasks, nails kept short and practical (no polish), clean but work-worn. WARDROBE: Torso - red and black plaid flannel shirt RGB #8B0000 (long-sleeved, well-worn but cared for, sleeves rolled up to mid-forearm revealing forearms, shirt untucked, sometimes unbuttoned over a white t-shirt RGB #FFFFFF). Lower body - faded blue denim jeans RGB #4A5568 (fitted, straight leg, patched at one knee with darker denim RGB #2C2C2C, well-fitting but practical). Footwear - brown leather cowboy boots RGB #5D4037 (scuffed but maintained, practical, with slight heel, worn but cared for). Accessories - silver belt buckle RGB #C0C0C0 with engraved design (small, decorative, personal), small backpack or satchel RGB #654321 (brown canvas, worn, multiple pockets, practical). Her smile is warm but her eyes show the weight of constant vigilance.
Annie.role: Protagonist. The daughter who must survive and protect her family. She represents hope, resilience, and the will to survive against overwhelming odds.

Sarah.name: Sarah
Sarah.description: Annie's mother, a woman in her late 30s who has learned to be hard and practical to protect her family. She's seen too much and trusts too little. Her movements are economical and purposeful. She's the one who taught Annie how to survive, how to read tracks, how to hide. She carries the weight of every decision, every sacrifice. Her love for her daughter is fierce and absolute, but she rarely shows softness anymore. She's always listening, always watching, always ready.
Sarah.appearance: Height: 168-173cm (5'6"-5'8"). Build: lean, strong, wiry from years of survival. SKIN TONE: RGB #D2B48C (tan, weathered from outdoor work, with deep lines around eyes and mouth from squinting and stress, age spots RGB #BC8F8F on hands and forearms). HAIR STYLE AND COLOR: RGB #8B4513 (auburn-brown base color), streaked with gray RGB #808080 (silver-gray strands throughout, especially at temples and crown), shoulder-length hair reaching just past collarbone when down, straight texture with slight natural wave, most often styled in: (1) tight bun at back of head (low bun, secured with hair tie, no loose strands), (2) single tight braid down back (neat, practical, no flyaways), or (3) pulled back in low ponytail (severe, no styling, purely functional). Hair is always pulled back tightly, never loose, practical and no-nonsense. No hair accessories visible except plain hair ties. EYE COLOR: RGB #556B2F (hazel-green, with brown flecks RGB #8B4513, sharp and watchful, showing exhaustion and determination, often narrowed in suspicion). Facial features: angular face, strong jawline, thin lips RGB #8B4513 often pressed together in a firm line, worry lines on forehead (horizontal creases), crow's feet around eyes. Hands: rough, calloused, with scars RGB #8B7355 and burns RGB #8B4513, capable and strong, nails kept very short and practical. WARDROBE: Outer layer - worn brown leather jacket RGB #3E2723 (bomber style, patched at elbows with darker leather RGB #1A1A1A, multiple pockets on chest and sides, zippered, well-worn but functional). Torso - dark green plaid flannel shirt RGB #2F4F2F (long-sleeved, worn, patched at elbows and cuffs, practical, sleeves often rolled up, shirt untucked). Lower body - dark blue denim jeans RGB #191970 (faded to lighter blue RGB #4A5568 in stress areas, reinforced at stress points with patches, straight leg, practical fit). Footwear - brown leather work boots RGB #5D4037 (well-worn, practical, scuffed, laced up tightly, no shine). Accessories - brown leather belt RGB #654321 with hunting knife in leather sheath RGB #3E2723 (knife handle visible, blade approximately 6 inches, always on right hip). Her expression is guarded, rarely smiling, eyes constantly scanning.
Sarah.role: Protagonist. The mother who must protect her daughter at all costs. She represents sacrifice, survival instinct, and the lengths a parent will go to protect their child.

Sheriff Miller.name: Sheriff Miller
Sheriff Miller.description: The local sheriff, a man in his 50s who's seen too much and done too little. He's caught between his duty to protect the citizens and the reality that some threats are beyond his control. He's weary, cynical, but not entirely without hope. He knows more than he lets on about what's happening in his county, but feels powerless to stop it. He moves with the weight of responsibility and regret.
Sheriff Miller.appearance: Height: 175-180cm (5'9"-5'11"). Build: stocky, going soft in the middle from desk work, but still strong. Skin tone: RGB #D4A574 (pale, indoor worker, with dark circles under eyes). Hair: RGB #696969 (salt-and-pepper gray, receding hairline, kept short and neat). Eyes: RGB #708090 (steel gray, tired, showing the weight of knowledge he can't act on). Facial features: square jaw, jowls beginning to form, mustache RGB #696969 (well-trimmed), permanent worry lines. Hands: large, capable, with ink stains from paperwork. Clothing: tan sheriff's uniform RGB #D2B48C (pressed but worn, badge polished), brown leather duty belt with gun and handcuffs, brown leather boots RGB #5D4037 (polished but scuffed from use). Always has a coffee stain somewhere on his shirt. His expression is weary, resigned, but not defeated.
Sheriff Miller.role: Supporting character. Represents the law and order that is insufficient to protect against the threat. He provides information and limited help, but cannot solve the problem.

Old Man Henderson.name: Old Man Henderson
Old Man Henderson.description: A reclusive old man who lives in the woods, knows the land better than anyone, and has seen hunters come and go for decades. He's gruff, suspicious, but ultimately helpful. He speaks in riddles and half-truths, testing those who seek his help. He's the keeper of local knowledge and hidden paths. His age and isolation have made him both wise and slightly unhinged.
Old Man Henderson.appearance: Height: 170-175cm (5'7"-5'9"). Build: thin, wiry, bent slightly with age but still strong, slight stoop to shoulders. SKIN TONE: RGB #BC8F8F (pale, weathered from decades outdoors, deeply wrinkled with creases and folds, age spots RGB #8B7355 on face, hands, and arms, sun damage visible). HAIR STYLE AND COLOR: RGB #FFFFFF (pure white hair, no color remaining), long and unkempt hair reaching past shoulders when not tied back, often matted and tangled, naturally wavy texture but unkempt, sometimes tied back with a piece of twine or leather strip RGB #654321 in a loose ponytail or bun, but often left loose and wild. When loose, hair falls around face in unkempt waves, no part visible, completely natural and unmaintained. FACIAL HAIR: Wild beard RGB #F5F5F5 (white-gray, long and unkempt, reaches mid-chest, uncombed and tangled, often has bits of food or debris caught in it, no trimming or shaping, natural growth pattern). Mustache RGB #F5F5F5 (long, unkempt, merges with beard, often stained yellow-brown from tobacco). EYE COLOR: RGB #8B4513 (brown, sharp and intelligent despite age, constantly moving and scanning, with slight yellowing of whites from age, but still alert and knowing). Facial features: deeply lined face (wrinkles in all directions, crow's feet, laugh lines, worry lines), prominent nose (large, slightly crooked), missing two front teeth (gap visible when speaking or smiling), remaining teeth tobacco-stained RGB #8B4513 (yellow-brown). Hands: gnarled, arthritic (knobby knuckles, bent fingers), with dirt RGB #654321 under nails, missing part of left index finger (cut off at second knuckle, healed but obvious). WARDROBE: Head - sometimes wears a worn cap RGB #654321 (brown, faded, with torn bill) but often goes bareheaded. Torso - layers of worn flannel shirts in various earth tones: outer layer RGB #8B7355 (brown-tan plaid, most visible), middle layer RGB #6B4423 (darker brown, visible at collar and cuffs), inner layer RGB #654321 (darkest, sometimes visible), all patched and mismatched, sleeves rolled up to reveal forearms, shirts untucked and hanging loose. Lower body - threadbare brown corduroy pants RGB #654321 (worn thin, faded, wide wale corduroy texture visible, held up with rope RGB #8B7355 instead of belt, baggy fit, patched at knees). Footwear - worn brown leather boots RGB #5D4037 (falling apart, held together with wire RGB #696969, soles separating, no laces or laces replaced with twine, completely worn out but still functional). Accessories - sometimes wears fingerless gloves RGB #654321 (brown, worn), no visible jewelry. Smells of wood smoke RGB #2C2C2C, tobacco RGB #8B4513, and earth RGB #654321. His expression is guarded but not unkind, eyes bright with hidden knowledge.
Old Man Henderson.role: Supporting character. The wise old guide who provides crucial information and safe haven. He represents the knowledge of the land and the hidden resources available to those who know where to look.

The Woods.name: The Woods
The Woods.description: A dense, foreboding forest in rural East Texas. The woods are thick with loblolly pines, live oaks draped in Spanish moss, and underbrush so dense it seems to swallow sound. The atmosphere is oppressive and claustrophobic—sunlight filters through in broken patches, creating deep shadows that seem to move. The air is heavy with humidity, the scent of pine needles, decaying leaves, and something else—something metallic and wrong. The woods feel alive and watchful, every rustle of leaves could be wind or something else entirely. Old logging roads crisscross the area, overgrown and barely visible. Abandoned hunting blinds perch in trees like skeletal sentinels. The ground is a carpet of pine needles, fallen branches, and mud that never fully dries. This is a place where people go missing, where sounds carry strangely, and where the line between predator and prey blurs.
The Woods.visual_details: Dense forest with loblolly pines (tall, straight trunks RGB #3D2817, dark green needles RGB #2F4F2F), live oaks (gnarled, twisted branches RGB #654321, Spanish moss hanging in gray-green tendrils RGB #8B8B7A), thick underbrush (yaupon holly, briars, ferns in various shades of green RGB #556B2F, #6B8E23). Ground: carpet of brown pine needles RGB #8B7355, fallen branches, patches of mud RGB #654321, exposed roots. Lighting: dappled sunlight filtering through canopy creating patches of light RGB #F5DEB3 and deep shadows RGB #1A1A1A, high contrast between light and dark areas. Old logging roads: narrow dirt tracks RGB #8B7355, overgrown with weeds, tire ruts filled with water. Abandoned structures: weathered wooden hunting blinds in trees (gray-brown RGB #5D4037), old fence posts (gray, splintered RGB #696969), rusted wire. Atmosphere: misty in early morning RGB #E0E0E0, hazy in afternoon, oppressive humidity visible as slight haze. Wildlife signs: deer tracks, broken branches, disturbed underbrush. Color palette: deep greens RGB #2F4F2F, #556B2F, browns RGB #654321, #8B7355, grays RGB #696969, #8B8B7A, with stark contrasts between light and shadow. The woods feel both ancient and actively hostile.

The Road.name: The Road
The Road.description: A narrow two-lane county road cutting through the rural Texas landscape. The asphalt is cracked and patched, faded to a dull gray-black. The shoulders are gravel and dirt, often washed out from rain. Road signs are weathered and bullet-riddled. Telephone poles line one side, their wires sagging. The road stretches endlessly, disappearing into heat shimmer in the distance. It's a place of transition and vulnerability—nowhere to hide, exposed to the elements and to anyone watching. The road connects the isolated places, but it also makes you visible. At night, it's lit only by headlights and the occasional distant farmhouse light, creating pools of illumination in an ocean of darkness.
The Road.visual_details: Two-lane asphalt road RGB #2C2C2C (cracked, patched with darker asphalt RGB #1A1A1A, faded white center line RGB #D3D3D3, yellow edge lines RGB #FFD700 where visible). Shoulders: gravel and dirt RGB #8B7355, often eroded, with weeds growing through. Roadside: telephone poles RGB #5D4037 (weathered wood, splintered), sagging power lines RGB #696969, occasional road signs (weathered, bullet holes, faded text). Surrounding landscape: fields of tall grass RGB #8B8B7A, barbed wire fences RGB #696969, distant trees. Sky: vast, often clear blue RGB #87CEEB or stormy gray RGB #708090. Heat shimmer visible in distance during day. At night: pools of headlight illumination RGB #FFD700, long shadows, distant lights. Road surface reflects light when wet RGB #4A4A4A. Mile markers and reflectors along edges. The road feels both endless and confining.

The Farmhouse.name: The Farmhouse
The Farmhouse.description: An old farmhouse that has seen better days. It's a two-story structure with a wide front porch, white paint peeling to reveal gray weathered wood underneath. The roof has missing shingles. The yard is overgrown, with an old pickup truck rusting in the drive. The house feels both like a sanctuary and a trap—familiar and safe, but also the first place anyone would look. Inside, it's sparsely furnished, every surface covered in a fine layer of dust. The windows are covered with heavy curtains, blocking most light. The house creaks and settles, every sound amplified in the silence. It's a place of memories and fear, where every shadow could be something more.
The Farmhouse.visual_details: Two-story farmhouse: white paint RGB #F5F5F5 peeling to reveal gray weathered wood RGB #696969 underneath, missing paint patches show original wood RGB #8B7355. Roof: asphalt shingles RGB #2C2C2C, missing sections reveal wood sheathing RGB #654321, rusted metal flashing RGB #8B4513. Front porch: wide, wooden boards RGB #8B7355 (warped, weathered), white columns RGB #F5F5F5 (peeling paint), swing hanging from one chain. Windows: double-hung, some broken panes replaced with cardboard or boards RGB #654321, heavy curtains visible through glass RGB #2C2C2C. Yard: overgrown grass RGB #8B8B7A, weeds, old pickup truck RGB #8B4513 (rusted, flat tires, missing parts), dirt driveway RGB #8B7355. Fence: white picket fence RGB #F5F5F5 (broken sections, leaning). Surrounding: fields, distant trees, isolation. Interior: sparse furniture (worn, practical), dust motes in light shafts, heavy shadows, worn linoleum floors RGB #696969, faded wallpaper. The house feels both lived-in and abandoned, a place holding its breath.

The Gas Station.name: The Gas Station
The Gas Station.description: A small, isolated gas station on the edge of town. It's a single-story building with two pumps out front, the kind that still had the old mechanical numbers that clicked. The building is cinder block painted a faded yellow, with a sign that's missing letters. The windows are covered with advertisements for beer and cigarettes, yellowed with age. Inside, it's cramped and dim, lit by fluorescent lights that buzz and flicker. The shelves are half-empty, dust gathering on products that haven't moved in months. It's a place of transition, where locals gather for gossip and strangers are immediately noticed. The parking lot is cracked asphalt with oil stains. An old payphone sits outside, its cord cut. This is where information is exchanged, where you learn who's been seen and who hasn't.
The Gas Station.visual_details: Single-story cinder block building RGB #D4A574 (faded yellow paint, chipped, showing gray block RGB #696969 underneath). Roof: flat, tar and gravel RGB #2C2C2C. Sign: missing letters, faded, neon tubes broken. Two gas pumps: old mechanical style RGB #8B4513 (rusty, with glass number displays), hoses RGB #000000 (cracked, weathered). Windows: covered with yellowed advertisements RGB #FFD700 (beer, cigarettes, faded), some broken panes taped over. Door: glass with bell that rings, screen door RGB #696969 (broken spring, slams). Parking lot: cracked asphalt RGB #2C2C2C, oil stains RGB #1A1A1A, faded parking lines RGB #D3D3D3. Payphone: old style RGB #696969, cord cut, graffiti. Interior: fluorescent lights RGB #E0E0E0 (buzzing, flickering), linoleum floor RGB #8B7355 (worn, stained), metal shelves RGB #696969 (half-empty, dust), cash register RGB #8B4513 (old mechanical style), cooler with glass doors RGB #696969 (condensation, old drinks). Atmosphere: dim, claustrophobic, smells of gasoline and stale coffee. This is a place where time has stopped.
